Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Large 3-inch LCD display, simple to use, price
Cons: Mixed image quality, short lens range, poor image stabilization, slow shooting speeds, no optical viewfinder
The Nikon Coolpix L24 is a cheap point-and-shoot camera with a few standout features, but reviewers agree that other inexpensive models offer more for your money. As the follow-up to the Nikon Coolpix L22 , the L24 is nearly identical except for a bump up from 12 to 14 megapixels. ...
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 2 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: This is my first digital point and shoot camera. I wanted something simple that would give me a nice picture. This Nikon camera is very nice looking especially in red. Once you find your way around in using the controls, it's pretty easy. The screen on the camera is really nice. The sound on video is good, but the video gets grainy when you enlarge on the computer to watch it in full screen. The pictures are very nice too, great color! Nice and bright. My hands are a little unstable so most look just a little out of focus blown up on the computer screen... even though it has VR. (For most of the pics, it's not even noticeable smaller.) I haven't had this camera very long to really try out all the features, so if I get to studying the manual, I probably could fix the problems above. Can't ... wait to see the pictures printed. I'm not disappointed in buying it and got a good price for it on sale. I feel it was worth it. It's a great little camera. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: Bought this camera to take pics while on vacation in Hawaii. Pros: It's compact and lightweight, easy to handle and has great picture resolution and zoom functions. Easy to tuck into my pocket while on a hike or walking along the beach. Good battery life/usage. Cons: It takes a bit longer to focus each shot than with the Kodak camera I owned previously. Selector buttons are a little small for large-fingered persons.
Item.HelpfulCount: 3 out of 3 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Just about everything
Cons: Devours regular batteries
I got this because my Olympus 760 got to where I couldn't see anything in the LCD screen during average & bright sunlight. I even put a pop up cover over it but to no avail. This camera has a darkened LCD screen with 6 different setting. Wow, now I can see what I'm shooting! At first my pictures were a little fuzzy on moving objects but I solved that by going into menu and selecting sports mode. Now my picture are great, my wife even commented how vivid they were! The videos turned out just as good too. She thought they all looked like HD pics on my PC screen! The transfer program from Nikon isn't as easy to use as my Olympus but I'm getting better at it as I go. It devours regular batteries so I got some good re ... chargeables, they lasts longer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: This is a nice camera for people that just want to document special moments or are beginning to get into photography. I had an earlier version of this camera, but it was dropped so I needed a new one. I upgraded to this one and I'm very pleased with it! The red is a beautiful color and the pictures are nice and clear. Sometimes it takes a little bit to focus, but I think that depends on the lighting. The Easy Auto Mode is perfect because it senses the lighting and object so you don't have to guess which setting to put it on, which can take some time. It is also really great for close-ups and still-lifes. I would recommend this camera because it is definitely worth the money (even though it's not that expensive!) and it's very easy to use. Overall, it's a great, simple camera!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: If you are good with electronic you will love but
Item.Review:
Pros: The good picture were great.
Cons: Auto just was not Auto enough
I could get it to take some good picture and movies but my wife had a hard time with it. The easy auto did not work right. Auto focus on the easy mode was to slow or would change after you had the picture framed up. The auto flash / auto color did not work to good. some picture were good and some were dark or the color was off. To much for a novice.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I've only had this camera a couple days. But I have shot a bunch of stuff with it and no glichs. I shoot Nikon digital and film cameras, maybe that is why everything on it was easy to use right from the begining. I bought it to carry on fishing and bird hunting trips, fits right in my pocket. But, I'm gonna have a belt pouch made for it from heavy nylon. I use my DSLR's to shoot the dog's now but only in training where I control everything. They are simply to large to carry hunting with me. This past summer I went on a tuna fishing trip off the Oregon coast, took my D5000. Got to thinking about it and 50mi out to sea is not where I should take an $800 camera and lense, better a [$] camera. Great buy for what I paid. I don't think it's the best thing since sliced bread but it does what I wa ... nt very well, takes very nice photo's and was a breeze to figure out.Really like it using AA alkline battery's, I keep a lot of them on hand for film camera's, flash's and a med format camera. I do suspect that there are other camera's that would fit my needs but having had one, going back to Nikon was easy to pick up. The other camera was a bit difficult to get thru. But it made a great first camera for my grandson.The not so great thing about it is it's so light it's hard for me to hold but VR fixes that.The question below I have one I can't answer. Short lag time? As compared to what, one of my DSLR's? Can't compare it to my other only point and shoot, long time since I've used it. Lag time will take some getting used to, even if it is short.I did take some photos with it and put them in my computer. Image quality is very very good. For what I need and what I paid, this is a steal! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: features, price
Cons: may be too many features for folks looking for simple.
You need to play around with the different picture settings, but this camera has lots of potential. If you want a extremely simple point and shoot digital, this isn't it. But it takes great pictures and video. Even has a built in speaker so you can listen to the video's audio. Nice camera for the price.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: This may be small in size but performs great, has lots of features, and is basically idiot-proof. It does not come with a memory card so you need to purchase one with it, otherwise the camera storage is only 5 pictures. Overall, a good camera for the price.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: motion stability - I take less fuzzy pictures now!
Cons: batteries
I love this camera - I had a clunky digital camera before and this one is light and easy to use. The software is intuitive - which is good for me - I am not a techie wizard. My favorite is the built in movie features - the sound quality is good and the film is good - rivals my daughter's Flip. Great buy for novice or family.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I purchased this camera in April of 2011. I do not have any complaints with the quality of the pictures, but the battery door is garbage. It is now Feb. 2012 and the battery door latch has broken off with no drops or mishandling. I keep it in a case in my purse which is never full. As I went to take pictures of my new nephew's birth the batteries popped out 4 times and I then realized the problem. Luckily this is a back-up for my Canon Rebel. After reading the reviews on Amazon this is not uncommon and also not covered by the 1 year manf. warranty. I am not usually one to comment or review, but I do not want anyone else to purchase without this knowledge.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Cons: Poor picture quality
Most pictures showed a pink over cast, with or without flash. Most subjects appeared very blurry (no matter what setting was used). The camera does use AA size batteries, which is important to me.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: reasonable price
Cons: rotten quality
Lasted only 2 weeks. Difficult to turn it on, even the clerks had difficulty, Refused to read memory cards and associates tried 3 different cards which worked okay in other cameras. Messages of dead battery but still continued taking dozens of images. I have no confidence in a replacement unit. This will ruin the holidays photos opportunities.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: great features, small and light, AA batteries!
Cons: nothing so far!
I just purchased this camera today, to replace a more sophisticated, but big and heavy Canon camera. I am pleasantly surprised. This camera has more features than I have expected, the pictures I haven taken so far are outstanding in quality, even with the camera set to only 8 MP, which I believe it plenty enough for everyday pictures. The setup was extremely easy, and love the fact that it runs on (2) AA batteries, no more worries if my camera runs out of battery while I am on the road, just keep a pack in my purse. I will once again begin taking more pictures, this camera is small and light enough to be carried around at all times, finally!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: The CoolPix line of cameras are great for using with school children. They have easy to use controls and yet include many advanced features. I've used these cameras for years and found them to hold up well with constant usage. the price is right and the 2 year warranty is a wise investment.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I really like how easy it is to use. The preview screen is nice and big and the pictures are really sharp. I'm still learning all the ins and outs, but am happy with it so far. Downloading to your computer is so easy.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: I would never recommend this to anyone!
Item.Review: This is the worst Camera I have ever had! Every time i try and take a picture the batteries pop out and it doesnt save!! Plus the color is messed up everything has a yellow tint to it.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent p&s digital camera for the price
Item.Review: My wife's old point & shoot camera had dies so I bought this one to replace it. She's thrilled with it and keeps it close by at all times to catch pix of the whole family. The picture quality is better than her old camera since it has more MP even though it was the same price.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I use this as a pocket camera for when I'm on my bike, or hiking. Pictures are much better than a phone camera, but it's inexpensive enough that I don't worry about damaging it. AA batteries are a huge plus and their life is good. Huge upgrade from my old Nikon L4 that served this purpose for me for over 4 years.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus; Nice Body Color; Good in Low Light; Great Zoom; Small / Compact; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use
My wife has a nice digital slr but wanted a smaller camera to go in her purse. A friend had one of these. She loved it. I bought one for my wife..she loves it, so when our daughter-in-law was looking for one, we gifted her this camera and she is thrilled. I love that it takes double A batteries. The size of it is perfect for taking it with you wherever. The picture is crisp and colorful.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: Coolpix by Nikon keeps getting better!
Item.Review: This is my second Coolpix by Nikon. It just keeps getting better. I use the macro setting to take pictures of the gold and silver thimbles I sell. I appreciate the fact that my settings stay fixed when I shut the camera off. The pictures I get are an asset to my retail business, and I always get great bids on the net. In addition the pictures I get on the auto setting are superior. I recommend this camera highly, both for performance and size. It is more compact than my former Coolpix 4300.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great little camera at a great price!
Item.Review: I am a real photo enthusiast and I have a lot of complicated gear for photo shoots. This camera lets me take great pictures for the fun it. I can leave the big gear home when I want to take somesnaps at a party or gathering. 14 pixels make a nice photo. It does, however have a design flaw- the battery/sd door is the weakest part (also the most used part) of the camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use and takes great pictures
Cons: Nothing that I can see.
Good little camera. Pictures are clear,good color. Easy to use and good on battery life.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: takes AA batteries
Cons: doesn't come with a SD card
All my engineers that I gave cameras too all seem to be satisfied. was a good price great pixel easy to use and it takes AA batteries that was a + for us.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I use my camera for occassional photography. The reason I purchased this camera is, my previous one had the trash can on the selection wheel. So when I went to scroll to the next picture, I was actually deleting my shots. Sounds dumb, I know, but I thought it was a stupid design, and decided to find a new one. This camera had such good reviews, and I wanted one with AA batteries, so I would not have to remember to recharge. I bought it and I LOVE IT! The pictures are so clear, and my battery life has been long. Just remember to turn the flash on for indoor usage, and you won't ever have blurred pictures!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I bought this camera for my wife's birthday, she always had a hard time using my camera, "too complicated" she says. It showed up at the door as we were just going out to celebrate, perfect timing. She loves it and I got the credit for it, thanks. Very easy to operate, great pictures and best of all, I get to use my camera again. The Dell purchase was a deal too, got some money off and free shipping too. Oh did I mention that great on time delivery? Saved my life.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: Just got the camera a little while ago. I find it very easy to use. The special effects seem to work very well. I didn't get to try the vidio yet. Got this becouse I got tired of lugging my Nikon D300s around all the time. I realy didn't think it would be OK, but it really suprised me. Working with B & H is a pleasure. There service and price is great. Main thing I still would have wanted is a viewfinder. PS i just got 2 more for my kids.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I have a non-profit animal educational organization and we do programs at different locations to educate kids and adults about our wildlife. We take pictures of our events and of the guest holding an animal. This camera is so easy to use, just point and shoot. It makes it east to take a picture and at the same time tyr and help the person hold an animal. Great job.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: This camera is very nice. Easy to operate, easy to download pics onto computer and takes excellent pictures. In fact, this is my second one as I purchased this as a gift for family member.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: compact, great pictures, easy to hook up to PC
Cons: A little bit of a learning curve, but very doable.
This camera is loaded with features. The quality is great. The features are a little hard to understand but with a little practice its very doable.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great for those like me who know nothing
Item.Review:
Pros: Even I can fiddle around a little and get better pictures
Cons: I don't find the settings very intuitive - get help!
My techier friends are impressed with it, and certainly the pictures are better than I used to take. Yes, they have had to help me with it at times. Unless you really know what you are doing, there is no need to pay more.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: Perfect for people who don't want to get over-whelmed with the whole photo process, but want nice clear photos. Camera easy to use, don't need an engineering degree to take a picture! Easy to carry without a dolly. Easily fits in shirt pocket or purse.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I have found myself depending too much on my cell phone for taking pictures as my preferred camera is very big and high tech. This camera has proved to be small enough to keep with me at all times,(in my bag, in the glove box, in my pocket) allowing me to catch every picture I wish I had the ability to in the past. The price is great... so if I do lose it, it is not the end of the world! We have just endured 16" of heavy snow in CT this October, knocking down trees, power lines, phones, etc... I am so happy to have this little buddy to document the devastation both for insurance purposes and for me to share. Great little camera!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Lots of features for the price
This camera was purchased as a gift for a (younger) family member. She seems to be very happy with it -- lots of features and quality for the price. I would rate this as an excellent value.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: Good Quality Pictures Without Killing batteries
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Quality Pictures
Cons: Nothing
Camera takes great pictures, is light & batteries last way longer in this camera than in my old one. I have taken 97 pictures with the original set of batteries & am still taking pictures.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: It uses AA batteries and not built recharageables
Cons: Figuring out how to record video
From the time I installed the memory card and batteries, I have not put it down. I like the compact size and pictur quailty. Plus the fact I don't have to worry about having to charge the camera. Aince it uses AA batteries, they can charge while I contuie to use the camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: Picture quality
Pictures are almost always blurry. The colors are never right. We've tried to correct this but just couldn't. Bought it for $60 on black friday. Never again!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Image quality and easy to use.
Cons: Pictures in motion is very poor.
I purchased this camera almost a year ago for my son to use. I've recently been using this camera more, due to the fact that I've noticed that the quality of image is superb in comparison to another named brand camera that we currently own. Although this is not the camera to use for anything in motion such as sporting activites. But if you like still shots and quality picture for a cheap price, then this is the camera to get. I've been very pleased on the image quality that this camera has produced.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
This is a very goodlooking cammera it is easy to use. It also takes good pictures. I brought it for a birthday present for my granddaughter and she just loves it.
Looking for an awesome cammera with great value this is it. you will love it. it can be brought for any age.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I bought this camera based on good reviews for use at work. It takes great, clear shots even in low lighting such as our warehouse aisleways. It is so good I am going to buy another one.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: good camera for pictures here and their
Item.Review:
Pros: NICE LOOKING CAMERA
Cons: BATTERYS ONLY LAST FOR A COUPLE HOURS.
BOUGHT CAMERA FOR VACATION AND WAS HORRIBLE. THIS CAMERA RUNS ON AA BATTERIES AND ONLY LAST FOR COUPLE HOURS.WOULD BE GOOD CAMERA IF HAD RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: User friendly.
Cons: Haven't found anything.
Nice camera. User friendly, easy to use and carry. Does a great job for the less seriously minded picture takers. Nikon makes nice products.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I purchased this camera to send with my co-workers to events when I'm not able to attend and photograph for our Center. It's easy to use and takes excellent photos. Ease of use was my primary concern when making my purchase since my co-workers' photography skills range.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: everything
Cons: haven't found anything I don't like about it
I just love the ease of this camera and the fact that it uses AA batteries... don't have any worries

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: Please beware when buying cameras from Nikon if you expect service, or be sure to buy the insurance. We had this camera 6 weeks and it quit. It was not covered under warranty. Surprise!! After reading many camera review sites it is apparent that Nikon does not cover much under warranty. I loved the service at Office Depot, so I guess it's back to the store and select a second brand.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: Great camera. This little dynamite does everything I expected and more. Great picture resolutions, ease of use, compact and very affordable. I recommend this camera to anyone who wants great pictures without the worry of how to operate it.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: The coolpix L24 is easy to carry and goes everywhere I go. My coolpix is always in my purse so now I never have to say I wish I had gotten a picture of that. It is very easy to use and the picture quality is awesome, I highly reccomend. [...]

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: this is the first digital camera I have ever bought and I am extrememly happy with my choice, Easy to use, great pictures, very sharp and looks good,also. My friends have all commented on how clear the pictures view on the view finder..got the camera to save memories of my grandchildren and could not be more pleased with the results..camera has all the options that the casual user will ever need and the price was excellent.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: Good point and shoot camera for a price
Item.Review: Use this camera when bringing DSLR is not a good option. Fully automatic camera that uses AA Batteries. Really cant complain much because of the price I paid. If I had to pay retail, I would have purchased a canon point&shoot since those are a little better overall.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I bought this camera for my wife because it's small, simple to use and AA batteries are easy to find anywhere (no need to carry a charger). I found I like the camera and my wife loves it because her photos seem to come out better than her old P/S camera. I use it when I want to travel really lite. The photos are clear and crisp. I'm very glad I bought it - for both of us!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: Camera was purchased for a non-technical, non-photographer friend who wanted a simple, straight forward camera that was easy to learn. This camera was an ideal choice.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I have iphone camera and I am pretty satisfied with it, but in night time the iphone does not take as better pictures as it should do I just wanted something not so expensive if in case needed. For this use it is fine, but sometimes the pictures really dont come out as well as you would think ! But overall forth is price it works ! Happy with purchase!!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Small / Compact; Good in Low Light; Large Clear LCD; Nice Body Color; Short Lag Time; Great Zoom; Good Image Stabilization
its swell.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: Bought as a spare camera it is easy and always handy cam. I prefer AA batts instead of a proprietary one. I always use rechargeable but, if needed, regular ones are always easy to find!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: i would refer a friend to buy
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Quality; Great Zoom; Good in Low Light; Large Clear LCD; Easy To Use
Cons: Short Battery Life
The product is really good and take very clear and nice photos though he battery doesnt last longer but all in all i love it

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus; Uses double A batteries; Nice Body Color; Good in Low Light; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Stabilization; Small / Compact; Easy To Use; Great Zoom; Good Image Quality
Great that you don't have to search for a specific battery!!!!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice Body Color; Good in Low Light; Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD; Small / Compact; Easy To Use
Cons: No Viewfinder; Battery memory door is weak; Cheap plastic parts break
Nice snapshot camera, cheap battery holder breaks render otherwise good unit junk.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice Body Color; Great Zoom; Light weight; Small / Compact; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use
Cons: Not so good in low light; No manual settings
I bought this for my photography class and while it's a very good camera for regular use it doesn't have all the features I need for my class.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Lots of fast automatic features
Cons: Short Battery life
I really like all of the features and the photo quality, I would have liked to have a battery pack that would last longer.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Size
Cons: Features, Price
Most of the camera's setting are a bit difficult to use for a pocket camera, even with 14 megapixel some of setting give a really bad picture.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: easy to use, took nice pictures
Cons: hard on batteries, short life
This is a good camera, although you'll go threw batteries like water, and after about a year, it just died and wouldn't turn back on. Loved it until it died.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: A good camera and easy to use
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Small / Compact; Easy To Use; Good Image Quality; Good Image Stabilization; Large Clear LCD; Good in Low Light; Nice Body Color; Short Lag Time; Fast/accurate auto-focus
Cons: No Viewfinder
easy to carry.....good photos....I have the same basic camera I have used for about 4 years now and it performs flawlessly and I know this will too

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD; Nice Body Color; Small / Compact; Good in Low Light
I've not explored all the features.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: price
The camera has good size screen and good features however not so much good for taking pictures on moving objects.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: camera is excellent for my needs
Item.Review: quick photos and short videos of new baby easy transfer to computer and e-mail have not found anything I do not like.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: Great price for a great camera. Excellent customer service!!!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: nice camera. love that it has a built in memory incase you forget your memory card at home. Great if you buy the rechargeable batteries to go with it.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: Great camera at a great price and the customer service was one of the best experience's I have ever had

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: Used for casual photography. Camping, hunting and outdoor activities. Easy to use and takes great pictures. Made by one of the great names in optics.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: This is a good camera for its price!!!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: I bought it for my daughter, It is very good price. I am happy and she is too.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: Love it! What great pictures and ease of use!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use
i use it for parties and church services and any outing

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.ReviewTitle: worst camera I have ever bought
Item.Review: This is the second one that I bought and both of them the flash did not work. Both were returned.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix L24 14 MP Digital Camera (Red)
Item.Review: First camera for my 12 year old. She loves it, so far.
